description:
Montreal, November 11, 2013 -- Python developer Rory Geoghegan presents python-logging-tree -- a module that introspects and displays the logger tree inside "logging".

* MP41: http://sflx.ca/mp41
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org

title: Module of the Month: logging_tree #MP41
